nodes.text: Star Wars: Darth Vader Vol. 2 is a hardcover compilation that collects issues 13–25 of the 2015 Marvel comics series, Star Wars: Darth Vader, as well as the one-shot Vader Down 1, and Star Wars issues 13–14. The book is published in hardcover on February 28, 2017.

Vader's down...but not out! When the Sith Lord faces an entire Rebel fleet on his own, and is sent crashing onto a nearby planet, two of the biggest titles in comics collide in the first crossover of the new Marvel age of Star Wars! Will the Rebels seize this opportunity to put an end to one of their greatest enemies - or will they be made to feel the full power of the Dark Side? Find out as the classic cast clashes with all-new favorites Doctor Aphra, Triple-Zero, Beetee and Black Krrsantan! Meanwhile, the natives of the planet Shu-Torun are revolting. And there's no way the Empire will stand for that. The imperial march of Darth Vader continues!
